A

AudioSwiftSession - Class in ohos.media.audio
Represents a low-latency and high-performance session for applications to play pulse-code modulation (PCM) audio.
AudioSwiftTrack - Class in ohos.media.audio
Represents a low-latency and high-performance data tack for applications to play pulse-code modulation (PCM) audio via sessions.
AudioSwiftTrack(AudioSwiftSession) - Constructor for class ohos.media.audio.AudioSwiftTrack
Represents a low-latency and high-performance data tack for applications to play pulse-code modulation (PCM) audio via sessions.

C

close() - Method in class ohos.media.audio.AudioSwiftSession
Closes this AudioSwiftSession instance to release audio resources.
create(AudioStreamInfo) - Static method in class ohos.media.audio.AudioSwiftSession
Creates an AudioSwiftSession instance based on a specified AudioStreamInfo instance.

G

getTrack() - Method in class ohos.media.audio.AudioSwiftSession
Obtains the AudioSwiftTrack instance as the audio input track, which is used for PCM data writing.

O

ohos.media.audio - package ohos.media.audio
 
open() - Method in class ohos.media.audio.AudioSwiftSession
Opens this AudioSwiftSession instance and initializes audio resources.

S

start() - Method in class ohos.media.audio.AudioSwiftSession
Starts this AudioSwiftSession instance.
stop() - Method in class ohos.media.audio.AudioSwiftSession
Stops this AudioSwiftSession instance.

W

write(byte[], int, int) - Method in class ohos.media.audio.AudioSwiftSession
Writes PCM data.
write(byte[], int, int) - Method in class ohos.media.audio.AudioSwiftTrack
Writes PCM data.
